subject: RE: [junit] Testing web services or web applications
msgSnippet: And what is the something you might have to say?  That web page you referred to does nothing to counter J. B Rainsberger s assertion. Todd.
messageBody:
And what is the something you might have to say? That web page you
referred to does nothing to counter J. B Rainsberger's assertion.


Todd.




________________________________

From: Chris Morris [mailto:chrismo@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 13, 2005 4:06 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] Testing web services or web applications


J. B. Rainsberger wrote:

>You can test the entire application through the web user
interface, but
>that's never been a good idea and it likely never will be.
>
>
We might have something say about that ;-)

http://clabs.org/wtr

--
Chris
http://clabs.org
